00027 xvalues = []
00028 yvalues = []
00029 
00030 outfile = ""
00031 
00032 options = ["xstart=", "xstop=", "infile=", "outfile=","help"]
00033 
00034 try:
00035     opts, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[1:], "", options)
00036 except getopt.GetoptError, err:
00037     # print help information and exit:
00038     print str(err) # will print something like "option -a not recognized"
00039     print options
00040     sys.exit(2)
00041 for o, a in opts:
00042     if o == "--help":
00043       print """%(name)s, version %(ver)s 
00044 This script get the a subset of a table
00045 
00046 Usage: %(name)s 
00047 Allowed options:
00048     --xstart     X.X  x value where the subset starts
00049     --xstop      X.X  x value where the subset stops
00050     --infile    FILE  input file
00051     --outfile   FILE  output file
00052 """ % {'name': os.path.basename(sys.argv[0]),'ver': '%version%'}
00053       sys.exit(0)
00054     elif o == "-v":
00055         verbose = True
00056     elif o == "--xstart":
00057         xstart = float(a)
00058     elif o == "--xstop":
00059         xstop = float(a)
00060     elif o in ("--infile"):
00061         infile = a
00062     elif o in ("--outfile"):
00063         outfile = a
00064     else:
00065         print options
00066         assert False, "unhandled option"
00067 
00068 for line in open(infile,"r").readlines():
00069         if line[0] != "@" and line[0] != "#":
00070                 values = line.split()
00071                 if float(values[0]) >= xstart and float(values[0]) <= xstop:
00072                         xvalues.append(float(values[0]))
00073                         yvalues.append(float(values[1]))
00074 
00075 f = open(outfile,"w")
00076 
00077 
00078 i = 0
00079 tempx = []
00080 tempy = []
00081 for x in xvalues:
00082     tempx.append (x)
00083     tempy.append(yvalues[i])
00084     i=i+1
00085 
00086 i = 0
00087 for x in tempx:
00088     f.write('%15.10e %15.10e i\n' % (x-xstart, tempy[i]))
00089     i=i+1
